content:
Akeem Gardner, Canurta's founder, holds two degrees – a Bachelor of Arts with a Major in Psychology and a Minor in Philosophy, and a Bachelor of Laws. Coupled with his experience playing and competing on high-level basketball teams, these diverse academic and athletic backgrounds have equipped him with unique insights and strengths to support his entrepreneurial journey. Akeem sees hemp as a powerful agent for transformative change. Five years ago, he embarked on a journey to cultivate hemp with the ambition of uncovering innovative approaches to revolutionize industries that significantly affect our well-being.

Akeem is determined to introduce genuine, nature-based solutions to inflammation, aiming to tackle the world's most pressing health challenge – effectively and safely preventing and managing chronic diseases. His entrepreneurial spirit, diverse skillset, and unwavering commitment to bettering global health drive him forward on his heroic quest for change.
